NaClSrpcChannel Struct Reference
[SRPC]

The encapsulation of all the data necessary for an RPC connection, either client or server. More...

Data Fields

  • NaClSrpcImcDescType imc_handle
  • uint64_t next_outgoing_request_id
  • NaClSrpcImcBuffer send_buf
  • NaClSrpcImcBuffer receive_buf
  • NaClSrpcService * server
  • NaClSrpcService * client
  • void * server_instance_data
  • int timing_enabled
  • double send_usec
  • double receive_usec
  • double imc_read_usec
  • double imc_write_usec

Detailed Description

The encapsulation of all the data necessary for an RPC connection, either client or server.

Field Documentation

NaClSrpcService* NaClSrpcChannel::client

The services available to this client.

NaClSrpcImcDescType NaClSrpcChannel::imc_handle

A handle to the IMC channel used to send and receive RPCs.

double NaClSrpcChannel::imc_read_usec

The number of microseconds spent in IMC receives on this channel while timing_enabled is true.

double NaClSrpcChannel::imc_write_usec

The number of microseconds spent in IMC sends on this channel while timing_enabled is true.

uint64_t NaClSrpcChannel::next_outgoing_request_id

The id of the next rpc request message sent over this channel.

NaClSrpcImcBuffer NaClSrpcChannel::receive_buf

A structure used to buffer data received over this channel.

double NaClSrpcChannel::receive_usec

The number of microseconds spent receiving on this channel while timing_enabled is true.

Includes time reported in imc_read_usec

NaClSrpcImcBuffer NaClSrpcChannel::send_buf

A structure used to buffer data to be sent over this channel.

double NaClSrpcChannel::send_usec

The number of microseconds spent sending on this channel while timing_enabled is true.

Includes time reported in imc_write_usec

NaClSrpcService* NaClSrpcChannel::server

The services implemented by this server.

void* NaClSrpcChannel::server_instance_data

A pointer to channel-specific data.

This allows RPC method implementations to be used across multiple services while still maintaining reentrancy

int NaClSrpcChannel::timing_enabled

A boolean value indicating execution timing is enabled on this channel.
